name: lunalytics
description: Lunalytics is a self-hosted analytics dashboard with built-in metrics tracking and visual reporting. It enables event capturing, KPIs, and interactive charts for better insights into user behavior and product usage.
features: Event Tracking: Capture user interactions with flexible event instrumentation to analyze behavior patterns and product usage across your application.
Visual Reporting: Interactive charts and graphs provide clear insights into KPIs, trends, and user engagement metrics at a glance.
Custom Dashboards: Build tailored visualizations with drag-and-drop widgets and real-time data updates to monitor metrics relevant to your team.
Metrics Tracking: Monitor key performance indicators with built-in analytics to understand user behavior and measure product success.
Self-Hosted: Full data control with custom deployment options to own your analytics infrastructure and ensure data privacy.
API Access: Integrate analytics data with external tools via REST APIs for custom reporting and automated workflows.
